com.socrata.api

Class SodaDdl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.socrata.api.SodaWorkflow
      • com.socrata.api.SodaDdl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SodaImporter

    public class SodaDdl
extends SodaWorkflow
    Provides APIs for altering the shape of a dataset, whether that be adding columns, removing columns, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • newDdl

        public static final SodaDdl newDdl(String url,
             String userName,
             String password,
             String token)
        Create a new SodaDdl object, using the supplied credentials for authentication.
        Parameters:
        url - the base URL for the SODA2 domain to access.
        userName - user name to log in as
        password - password to log in with
        token - the App Token to use for authorization and usage tracking. If this is null, no value will be sent.
        Returns:
        fully configured SodaDdl

      • searchViews

        public SearchResults searchViews(SearchClause... searchClauses)
                          throws SodaError,
                                 InterruptedException
        Searches for matching datasets based on certain criteria. The criteria to search on are based on the SearchClauses classes. Multiple clauses will be treated as AND-ed together.
        Parameters:
        searchClauses - the clauses to search
        Returns:
        Throws:
        SodaError
        InterruptedException

      • createDataset

        public DatasetInfo createDataset(DatasetInfo dataset)
                          throws SodaError,
                                 InterruptedException
        Creates an empty dataset, based on the dataset passed in. The new dataset will be unpublished.
        Parameters:
        dataset - dataset to create the new dataset on. The ID should NOT be set.
        Returns:
        the created dataset, the ID will be set on this.
        Throws:
        SodaError
        InterruptedException

      • loadDatasetInfo

        public DatasetInfo loadDatasetInfo(String id)
                            throws SodaError,
                                   InterruptedException
        Loads a dataset or view based on it's ID
        Parameters:
        id - the ID to load the view through.
        Returns:
        The View with the supplied ID.
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException
        SodaError
        InterruptedException

      • updateDatasetInfo

        public DatasetInfo updateDatasetInfo(DatasetInfo datasetInfo)
                              throws SodaError,
                                     InterruptedException
        Updates a view. Depending on the properties being updated, this MAY require the dataset to be a working copy.
        Parameters:
        datasetInfo - the dataset to update to. The ID MUST be set. If this is a Dataset object, the dataset should be a working copy.
        Returns:
        the dataset after the update.
        Throws:
        SodaError
        InterruptedException
